subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Meg Bulger scored 19 points and No. 13 West Virginia rolled to a 93-26 victory Saturday against Presbyterian, which is in its first year as a Division I program.
snippet: Meg Bulger scored 19 points and No. 13 West Virginia rolled to a 93-26 victory Saturday against Presbyterian, which is in its first year as a Division I program.
